description: shapes in brown and black washes on off-white paper; brown rectangle in upper one-third and white triangle in lower one-third with other abstracted shapes and marks throughout; off-white mat; framed behind glass in dark brown wood frame
provenance: The artist; (Knoedler & Co., New York, sold to Mersky); Mary and Bob Mersky, Minneapolis; given to MIA, 2011.
title: Untitled
